attributes.action: Vote of No Confidence in the Coalition Government
attributes.additional_details:
We, the dispirited peoples of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, implore the Opposition Party to call for a vote of no confidence in the current coalition government.

We, the people, have endured the Coalition's intolerable and ignorant actions since May 2010, and now as Black April is set to hit the majority of the people the Government falsely claims to stand for, the people implore the Opposition to stand for the downtrodden people of Great Britain to vote out this collapsing shambles that currently govern us.

Let it be known that the signatories of this petition have no confidence in the current Conservative led government in their ability to effectively govern this nation.
